project_abstract.cdata: The Second Education Project will finance the foreign exchange costs of (i) the extension and further equipping of the Schools of Education and Engineering of the University of Zambia; and (ii) the construction and furnishing of student hostels, including staff housing, to accommodate the increased registration in these schools.
